dmca.title: Capital Publications Complains of Repeat Infringement
dmca.body:
THE LAW OFFICE OF
WILLIAM WORDSWORTH
[Private]
WASHINGTON, DC 20006
Tel: [Private]

September 15, 2003

Yahoo! Inc.
[Private]
Sunnyvale, California 94089
Phone: [Private]
Fax: [Private]

RE- Copyright Violations & Spamming Yahoo! Search Results

Dear Sir/Madam

Thank you for making the last corrections for our copyright violations. Unfortunately, since that time, further copyright violations have occurred or continues to plague your search directory.

Due to Google's failure to resolve our copyright issues in the recent past, we're filing a suit against Google for copyright infringement.

The following websites have either taken text directly from our website and/or used our image of the capitol. One offender, in particular, has spammed your search results with numerous URLs for the same grants subject matter.

These websites do not have any authorization to use any of our intellectual properties. Under Yahoo!'s copyright regulations found at http://does.yahoo.com/infb/copyright/copyright.html we are filing our official complaint to you for immediate resolution of our problems.

List of copyright violators:

--- Southwick, MA--
grant-review.com

--- Rock Island, Il--
government-grants.org

--- Diamond Bar, CA--
government-grants-funding.com

--- Riverside/Moreno Valley, CA--
grants.biz
http://www.college-scolarships-grants.biz
http://www.freegovmoney.net
http://www.businessgrants.biz
http://www.freemoney.governmentalgrants.com
http://www.gov.grants.biz
http://www.government-federal-grants.com
http://www.governmentalgrants.com
http://www.governmentgrants.grants.biz
http://www.grantseekerpro.com
http://www.grants.governmentalgrants.com
http://www.grants.government-federal-grants.com
http://www.gsp-grantseekerpro.com
http://www.smallbusinessgrants.biz
http://www.small-business-grants.biz
http://www.unique-finance.com
http://www.governmentgrantsdirect.com

---Tel Aviv, Israel--
government-grants-10l.com
bizmove.com/business-grants.shtml

--Colton, CA--
infoweb1.com

---Riverside,CA--
mygovernmentgrants.com

Enclosed are copies of their offending websites and the exact location from our website where the copyright violation occurred.

Repeat offenders should be permanently banned from your search results in order to stop both the continuing copyright violations and spamming.

Respectfully,

Attorney [Private]

1. Statement from [private]; Capital Publications

2. A description of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property that you claim has been infringed; capitalpublications.com: (See attorney letter),

3. A description of where on the site the infringing material is located, See attached listings

4. [private], Capital Publications, [Private], Washington, DC 20036

5. I [private], do solemnly swear, that I have a good-faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the-copyright or intellectual-property owner, its agent, or the law;

6. I, [private], made under penalty of perjury, that the above information in my Notice is accurate and that I am the copyright or intellectual property owner, authorized to act on the copyright or intellectual property owner's behalf.


[private] 	8-14-03
                                 9-15-03
